resources.string: Search for subreddits by clicking on the magnifying glass. The search will find videos posted to reddit.com/r/subreddit, where subreddit is the provided search term. A search for "cats" gets videos from the cats subreddit at reddit.com/r/cats.
Use the subreddits list to browse videos related to specific topics. Tap a name to get an updated list of videos from that subreddit.
Tap \u25c2\u2759 or \u2759\u25b8 to play the previous or next video.
Tap UP or DOWN to vote a video up or down. Voting is only possible after logging in.
Tap on %1$s to log in with a reddit account. Logging in will automatically import all subreddit subscriptions from the account. After logging in, videos can be voted up or down.
A \u2605\'d subreddit will be saved to
